definition.name: "AWS CodeBuild run build" Action For GitHub Actions
definition.description: Execute CodeBuild::startBuild for the current repo.
definition.author: aws-actions

inputs.name: compute-type-override
inputs.description: The name of a compute type for this build that overrides the one specified in the build project.

inputs.name: environment-type-override
inputs.description: A container type for this build that overrides the one specified in the build project.

inputs.name: image-override
inputs.description: The name of an image for this build that overrides the one specified in the build project.

inputs.name: image-pull-credentials-type-override
inputs.description: The type of credentials CodeBuild uses to pull images in your build.

inputs.name: env-vars-for-codebuild
inputs.description: Comma separated list of environment variables to send to CodeBuild

inputs.name: update-interval
inputs.description: How often the action calls the API for updates

inputs.name: update-back-off
inputs.description: Base back-off time for the update calls for API if rate-limiting is encountered

inputs.name: disable-source-override
inputs.description: Set to `true` if you want do disable source repo override

inputs.name: source-version-override
inputs.description: The source version that overrides the sourceVersion provided to Codebuild.

inputs.name: source-type-override
inputs.description: The source input type that overrides the source input defined in the build project for this build. Valid values include NO_SOURCE, CODECOMMIT, CODEPIPELINE, GITHUB, S3, BITBUCKET, and GITHUB_ENTERPRISE.

inputs.name: source-location-override
inputs.description: The location that overrides the source location defined in the build project for this build.

inputs.name: hide-cloudwatch-logs
inputs.description: Set to `true` to prevent the CloudWatch logs from streaming the output to GitHub

inputs.name: disable-github-env-vars
inputs.description: Set to `true` if you want do disable github environment variables in codebuild

inputs.name: artifacts-type-override
inputs.description: The type of build output artifact

inputs.name: stop-on-signals
inputs.description: Comma separated list of process signals on which to stop the build. Default is SIGINT.

outputs.name: aws-build-id
outputs.description: The AWS CodeBuild Build ID for this build.
